actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to require the Civil Aeronautics Board to rescind the authority of any air carrier to provide nonstop service between any two points if such authority is not utilized within a certain period of time;  to authorize the provision of new nonstop service by certificated air carriers between such points without hearings.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 to require the Civil Aeronautics Board to rescind the authority of any air carrier to provide non-stop service between two points if such authority is not exercised for any continuous one-year period. Authorizes the Board to grant such authority to another carrier with or without a hearing.

titles.title: A bill to require the Civil Aeronautics Board to rescind the authority of any air carrier to provide nonstop service between any two points if such authority is not utilized within a certain period of time;  to authorize the provision of new nonstop service by certificated air carriers between such points without hearings.
